job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad (Backend, Full-stack, & ML)
job.description: ltstronggtAt Instabaseltstronggt were passionate about building software to advance the state of the art in computing Weve built a fearlessly experimental customerobsessed team who are making discoveries to fundamentally change how people build and consume business applicationsltbrgtltbrgtToday were partnering with the worlds leading companies to transform how they use data and technology If these challenges excite you wed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Engineering Teamltstronggt architects the underlying operating system core services platform infrastructure dev toolkits core algorithms machine learning models packaged enduser apps and app store marketplace Instabase engineers are excited to solve hard problems for complex organizations and are selfstarters from day oneltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Tech Stackltstronggt is React and Typescript on the frontend Our product and infrastructure is written in Go Python Java and C We operate using the microservices model and leverage Docker and Kubernetes for our deploymentsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere hiring across all teams and technical areas ltstronggtThis includes Frontend ProductFullStack Systems Infrastructure Machine Learning and AIltbrgtltbrgtInterested in learning more Explore the ltstronggtInstabaseltstronggt ltstronggtproductltstronggt and read about the ltstronggtIntern experience ltstronggthereltstronggtltstronggt
